title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t0.0
text: How can organizations take advantage of existing deep domain knowledge?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t7.16
text: Find out how one airline is upscaling its frontline workforce on today's episode.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t13.3
text: I'm Michelle McCracken from Delta Airlines and you're listening to Me, Myself and AI.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t19.64
text: Welcome to Me, Myself and AI, a podcast on artificial intelligence and business.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t24.72
text: Each episode we introduce you to someone innovating with AI.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t28.419999999999998
text: I'm Sam Ransbotham, Professor of Analytics at Boston College.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t32.56
text: I'm also the AI and Business Strategy guest editor at MIT Sloan Management Review.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t38.019999999999996
text: And I'm Shervin Kottubande, senior partner with BCG and one of the leaders of our AI business.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t44.32
text: Together, MIT SMR and BCG have been researching and publishing on AI since 2017,

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t51.12
text: interviewing hundreds of practitioners and surveying thousands of companies

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t55.42
text: on what it takes to build and to deploy and scale AI capabilities

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t59.54
text: and really transform the way organizations operate.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t64.34
text: Today Shervin and I are excited to be joined by Michelle McCracken,

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t67.18
text: who's a senior manager of analytics learning and development for Delta Airlines.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t71.02
text: Michelle, thanks for joining us. Welcome.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t73.02000000000001
text: Thank you for having me.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t74.62
text: All right, let's get started.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t75.38
text: We got interested in what Michelle was doing because we learned about this analytics academy.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t80.44
text: So why don't we start with that?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t82.18
text: Tell us about the analytics academy and what that means.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t84.96
text: Analytics academy is a program that we started about a year ago with Georgia State University.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t91.16
text: And this program was designed to create a career pathway for our frontline employees,

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t96.36
text: our operational experts, those individuals that you are interacting with day to day in the airport.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t102.3
text: So it might be a flight attendant, a gate agent.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t104.94
text: They are what we believe is truly the experts on what happens and what it takes to run the airline.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t111.38
text: And this program is a nine month program that allows them to stay in their nine to five job

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t118.08
text: and they get to learn analytics on the side.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t122.12
text: And then ultimately at the end of the program transition into a full time analytics role.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t126.82
text: And we do this by the first semester, bringing them up on data foundations with Georgia State University.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t133.06
text: So they're doing this three to five hours a week on their own time, all asynchronous.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t138.04000000000002
text: So they're not in the classroom day to day, but they're able to work through it on their own time on the computer.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t144.04000000000002
text: And then the second semester they spend with my team, the analytics learning and development team,

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t149.08
text: working on how we take data and apply it at Delta and what levers we pull, what do we look at, how do we move forward.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t156.52
text: And this really allows them to take that information they learned in the first semester and really apply it to real life examples they're familiar with.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t163.86
text: So for example, we look at whether an airline is going to arrive on time.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t169.1
text: That is something we report out to the DOT, but it's also a metric that we look at internally and measure against every day.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t176.5
text: We teach them how they might use analytics to drive that calculation.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t181.1
text: And this allows them to deepen their knowledge that they learned in the front line to start with.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t187.06
text: And then the third semester is where they really get to apply that information.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t190.8
text: And that is when they get to join a full time analytics organization for an internship.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t196.22
text: They leave their full time job for the first time in the program, and their nine to five is now an analytics internship.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t203.10000000000002
text: And they're still paid normally, but they get to instead of focusing on their front line role, they get to focus on applying those new analytic skills right here in the organization.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t213.3
text: That's really interesting.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t214.72000000000003
text: Can you explain what's included in the first semester, what skills are students learning there?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t220.74
text: So with Data Foundations, our goal really is to challenge the student to think about data as a whole.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t227.34
text: So think differently and really challenge them to look at how to ask the question, how to get there.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t232.94
text: But then furthermore, they learn a bunch of tools to keep in their toolbox.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t236.52
text: So Advanced Excel, Python, SQL, they learn the start to Tableau and a little bit of Power BI.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t244.44
text: So how long have you been doing this?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t246.4
text: We launched our first class in May of 2022, and our second class launched in August.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t253.74
text: And so our first class actually graduated in December, and we are excited to report that 100% of participants got placed in a full time position.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t265.48
text: Oh, that's great.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t266.44
text: So how many people were involved in this?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t268.48
text: We had 750 applications the first time around, which we brought down to 24 students split over two cohorts.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t276.78000000000003
text: So 12 students in each cohort.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t279.54
text: Wow, 750 people were interested in this program and you only, 24, that's great.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t284.84000000000003
text: So that's great from your side, but it actually speaks a lot to the demand for these sort of skills.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t290.64000000000004
text: How did you get people interested in this?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t292.84000000000003
text: How did they publicize it?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t293.94
text: Thanks for listening to Me, Myself and AI.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t299.24
text: Our show is able to continue in large part due to listener support.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t302.74
text: Your streams and downloads make a big difference.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t305.3
text: If you have a moment, please consider leaving us an Apple podcast review or a rating on Spotify and share our show with others you think might find it interesting and helpful.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t314.04
text: Definitely.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t320.34
text: I would say the biggest thing with interest for the program.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t323.6
text: One of the things we found with our frontline is there's absolutely a desire to do more and learn more.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t329.16
text: With Delta, I've worked at other companies prior to coming to the organization.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t333.46000000000004
text: One of the things I found is most of our employees intend to stay at Delta for life and they love the organization.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t340.1
text: They're very bought into the culture.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t341.96000000000004
text: And so for them, it's not what's my next move outside of Delta, it's what's my next move here?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t347.90000000000003
text: And so there is a really great desire to move up in the organization.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t352.4
text: And with the ever-growing demand in the analytics space, there is an increased demand in how do I get involved?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t358.85999999999996
text: And honestly, that's how this program got developed is because we kept having frontline agents reach out saying, hey, I'm really interested in getting involved in analytics.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t368.14
text: Where do I even start?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t369.65999999999997
text: And quite honestly, we didn't necessarily have a path other than saying, hey, go back and get another degree in analytics or go join a boot camp.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t378.8
text: And really how this started was because we were at first referring to different boot camps in the area, but there wasn't necessarily the perfect boot camp that checked all the boxes for every single thing we needed and still gave them the Delta background.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t392.66
text: And that's how we decided, you know what, let's create something of our own that we can customize and really map out what we want them to learn, how we want them to learn it, and then teach them to apply it throughout the program.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t405.8
text: Makes sense.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t406.8
text: I mean, in picking from such a huge pool of people down to the 12 and 24 size cohorts, how did you make those tough decisions?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t415.90000000000003
text: What were some of the criteria that you looked at in determining who was in the program and who was not?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t421.26
text: The biggest thing for us is process improvement.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t424.46000000000004
text: So the desire to take that step and, you know, make those process improvements in their organization.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t430.90000000000003
text: We have them go through a multi-phase interview process.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t434.06
text: And so in one of the phases, we ask them questions about in your current role, can you give us an example of an idea that you've brought up that would be a process improvement for your space?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t443.86
text: Other things would be just overall, I would say excitement around analytics, but the interest to know more.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t449.82
text: And so a big thing for us that we talk about in our analytics space is around data curiosity.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t455.42
text: And we can teach all of the coding and the background and all of that.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t459.72
text: But if there's no curiosity around data and the desire to learn more or ask why, we can't teach that.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t465.52000000000004
text: And that is really fundamentally what we look for when we look for the right candidate.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t471.18
text: I'm curious, we know there's a war for talent and particularly tech talent.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t476.22
text: So let me play devil's advocate here for a second.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t478.92
text: You could also hire data science specialists from outside.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t482.52000000000004
text: Can you comment a bit on if you also take that approach?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t487.04
text: One of the things with Delta is we are very much a girl from a talent standpoint.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t491.98
text: And so we really believe that the heart and soul of our organization is our frontline employees.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t498.54
text: And while we can absolutely give those analysts that are coming out of school and we do give them the opportunity to rotate into the operation, this is just another channel and another way for us to utilize that talent pool that's out there.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t512.1999999999999
text: One of the things as we looked at how we really got here was we're ultimately trying to broaden our talent pool.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t519.4
text: One of the things we found is more and more every single year, we're the organization that everybody within Delta comes to to look for analytics talent.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t527.6
text: And we continue to get tapped for resources and tapped for resources.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t532.16
text: And at one point had the conversation of we have to change how we're looking for talent because we're getting to the place where we're just we're not able to compete in the market when everybody wants the same type of talent and how can we do it differently.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t546.84
text: And so we still see value and we still find hiring directly from a university or hiring someone that has, you know, 10, 15 years of experience just as valuable and giving them those rotations into the operation.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t559.76
text: But this is a third path that really was underutilized before that allows us to take those frontline operators that are excellent with our customers and do an amazing job and really teach them the analytics side on the back end versus kind of having to do the other way around.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t578.02
text: That makes sense because people are coming from different places.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t581.02
text: And I think what I'm hearing you say is that you're looking to build this out from lots of different directions and it was, you know, why not try everything versus putting all your eggs in one basket?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t592.0799999999999
text: You can try several different approaches.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t594.68
text: Definitely.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t595.18
text: One of the things we've found is, you know, we say all the time data drives Delta.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t600.04
text: And every like I said, every year we continue to see a greater need for not just data analytics, but for the more in-depth machine learning data scientists as a whole.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t611.18
text: And we're just not able to meet that demand with our traditional recruiting strategies.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t616.18
text: So it's this is a way for us to broaden that and get more talent in the pipeline.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t620.62
text: Makes sense.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t621.7
text: I'm thinking about this third semester.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t623.8
text: I think you described as more of an internship within your organization.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t627.64
text: I guess I have a clear picture of what the first semesters look like because they're more familiar to my academic background.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t634.1
text: But what's that third semester look like?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t636.78
text: The third semester is going to look very similar to the traditional co-op experience or summer internship experience where they're coming in.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t645.14
text: They're learning.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t645.84
text: A lot of them may not be interning in an area they have experience.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t650.3
text: For example, on my team, I have one side that's strategy.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t654.3
text: I could have had an intern and that intern could be working on building dashboards specifically for people metrics.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t661.5
text: Now, if they came from airport customer service, they were one of those people we would have been reporting out on, but they would not have been looking at that type of data day in and day out.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t671.74
text: And so the first part of it is really integrating them in to understand the business they're starting to support.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t677.44
text: And then they give them a project that they work on throughout that semester.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t680.46
text: So they're able to have a tangible project that at the end of the semester, they're able to show to those interviewers that may be hiring them full time.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t689.0
text: Here's something I've worked on.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t690.1600000000001
text: Here's a dashboard I created.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t692.1600000000001
text: Here's why it's important.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t693.74
text: And they're able to do that on their own.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t696.5
text: Example, I guess, one is this dashboard.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t699.24
text: What are some other examples of the kinds of projects that the first 12 have worked on?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t704.7800000000001
text: They look at, for example, turn time.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t707.12
text: Turn time is the amount of time it takes us from the time a plane touches down on the ground to the time that the plane pulls back from the gate and they are off to their next destination.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t717.02
text: We had one of our interns do a complete analysis on how do we reduce the turn time in a particular airport.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t723.3000000000001
text: One of them works in the technical operations space, and he was able to help from an inventory standpoint create an app that would help them on a day to day basis.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t732.5799999999999
text: And so it's interesting because we've seen them take some of these things and apply them into their normal day to day jobs, not even just in their internships.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t740.64
text: That makes sense.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t741.48
text: I think probably people listening might be curious about how you ended up here, but I'm also curious, are there things that you would have done differently?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t747.92
text: You've gone through two cohorts.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t749.3199999999999
text: What's changing your thinking?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t750.48
text: What can people learn from maybe what didn't quite go perfectly?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t755.92
text: I think the first thing we probably would have done differently or the thing that we've actually pivoted to do a little bit differently with our second cohort is bringing more subject matter experts in to talk to the students in semester two.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t767.9599999999999
text: So in semester one, they're getting those foundations.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t770.3
text: They're just starting to understand.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t772.4599999999999
text: And then semester two, really sitting down and having them have exposure to, for example, a leader from revenue management, a leader from reservations and customer care and how they use data.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t784.66
text: From our standpoint, we obviously support data analytics from across the organization, but it's better when you can get someone that's dealing with it day in and day out and they're able to make that connection earlier on.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t796.08
text: We've also tied those specific areas, tied to certain concepts that they're learning.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t800.92
text: So they're actually getting a reinforcement of those concepts in semester two.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t804.88
text: So for example, with Python, when they go into Python training, we tie that with crew so that we have a leader from our crew space where they look at how do we make sure we have the flight attendants where they need to be and our pilots where they need to be.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t818.92
text: That leader is using examples and showing them in Python how they support that data.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t825.74
text: That's great.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t826.6
text: Can we jump back to Sam's first question, Michelle?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t829.24
text: How did you end up in this role at Delta?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t832.14
text: My story is actually really unique.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t833.52
text: I was the HR business partner supporting analytics for two and a half years prior to and then through the pandemic.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t842.04
text: I've always had an analytical background and a passion around using data to support the story.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t848.36
text: And I would define myself in the scope of analytics as a storyteller.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t853.16
text: But that being said, I never had imagined or dreamed that I would ever move into the analytics space.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t858.52
text: And we got into this conversation where we continued to find ourselves looking for talent and how are we going to get it and what does that look like?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t866.9599999999999
text: And my passion is really around strategy.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t868.9599999999999
text: And so I had built out a strategy that was, how do we look at this from multiple angles and pitched the idea of let's launch this program, let's launch an academy, let's train from within.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t880.48
text: And the opportunity presented itself for me to come over and lead this team.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t884.72
text: And it's been an amazing journey because along the way, I somehow became an analytics leader and I'm now leading an analytics team and I wouldn't trade it for the world.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t894.44
text: I think the more that I get in the space of analytics, it pulls me in more and it makes me want to understand more.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t900.64
text: And I think it's a lesson to everybody to be open to the opportunities that get put in front of you because your next opportunity may be something that's totally outside of the scope of what you think it may be.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t912.0400000000001
text: You mentioned that you've just graduated and all 12 of your first cohort have gotten placed in, I think what you described as analytical roles of some sort.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t921.0400000000001
text: Yep.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t921.48
text: How'd that feel?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t923.24
text: Fantastic.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t924.2
text: It's one of those surreal moments that, you know, on paper it feels really good.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t928.44
text: So you're like, okay, great, all of them are placed.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t930.7600000000001
text: And then you take a step back and you, you know, we're at graduation and you feel you changed 12 lives.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t937.08
text: These are 12 lives where they went from being in a frontline operator role where they could have been working on midnight shift.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t944.16
text: It wasn't until the graduation day that I think it all really hit me that it all kind of came full circle and really felt like it really is changing people's lives.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t952.6
text: And I was able to be a little part of that.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t955.64
text: So what's next?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t956.92
text: I mean, this seems to have worked.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t958.12
text: Is it 12 to 24 to 36 to 48 or is it something different?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t963.88
text: We are going to have three cohorts, about 60 students.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t966.8
text: We'll go through.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t968.0799999999999
text: This program was the start and was able to help us launch what is called Delta Data University, which is a university that focuses on three main pillars.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t978.4399999999999
text: The first is Pivot, and that's where Delta Analytics Academy lives.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t982.28
text: The second is around Accelerate, and that is the building blocks or e-learnings that students can go through to kind of get additional information or additional learning on, for example, data engineering or data science.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t996.88
text: And then the third is Enrich.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t998.76
text: And so that program is really meant for those that want to stay in their current job and not pivot to a different area or not change or accelerate to a different type of analytics world.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1008.7199999999999
text: But just understand, for example, there's a Python course that's in there that would allow the student to understand and learn Python, but the goal would be for them to use it in their day to day job that they're in.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1019.84
text: We'll be focusing on launching an analytics course for station managers, which will help us raise that waterline of understanding and analytics across the board.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1029.1200000000001
text: And our hope is that we just are able to increase data fluency across the organization and really allow us to solve more complex problems across Delta.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1040.16
text: So we talked about the analytics.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1042.28
text: How does this fit into the overall broad talent strategy?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1045.8
text: You've got these three pillars, but is this you're thinking about AI and analytics strategy?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1052.04
text: I mean, there must be something about pulling people in from outside.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1055.4399999999998
text: I think you mentioned before earlier.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1056.76
text: How does this fit into the even bigger picture?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1059.3999999999999
text: Yes, so I would say twofold.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1062.2
text: First and foremost, the develop within our bigger picture of how we recruit talent from the outside, we absolutely are still recruiting from the outside.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1070.96
text: But the bigger question is, once they come here, how do we retain them?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1075.3999999999999
text: And so that is really what Accelerate hits on is we want to be able to offer ways for our employees that are here in the analytics field that want to continue to grow.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1086.24
text: That is when we look at our employee survey results, when we have conversations and roundtables, we continually hear, I don't have enough education.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1093.84
text: I want to be able to go back to school.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1095.1599999999999
text: I want to get more exposure to this.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1097.6399999999999
text: I want to do this.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1098.76
text: This allows us to open up and really give them the courses that they're looking for.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1104.48
text: And so this will be ever evolving as we see a need for different items, machine learning, different things that come up for us to be able to create those customized courses and offer them to our employees.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1115.56
text: That's really the goal.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1117.28
text: And so that does not deviate from us changing and wanting to recruit from outside or inside.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1122.04
text: The goal is we just want to make sure that we're retaining that talent once they're here.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1126.24
text: That makes a lot of sense because it's changing so quickly, too.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1129.64
text: I mean, that's the other thing you're up against is that even if you had everybody all perfectly trained today, then the decay on these topics is pretty rapid.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1139.5200000000002
text: Yes.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1140.0
text: And for us, it's not even necessarily about a gap in skill set or a gap in somebody not being able to do something.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1146.44
text: It's more about giving them the opportunity to continue to advance if they want to.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1151.48
text: We hire a lot of go getters.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1152.8400000000001
text: They want to keep going.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1153.8400000000001
text: They want to keep learning.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1155.24
text: And we want to be able to support that as long as we can.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1158.48
text: So what I think is also fun about this, let's go back in time 10 years ago, I think if you said, oh, yeah, I'm going to put people through a 12 week program to learn data science.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1167.56
text: You'd laugh at people because how could you accomplish anything of that magnitude in this amount of time?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1174.2
text: I think one thing that we're seeing as we're talking to lots of people is how these tools are getting more accessible for people.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1181.64
text: And I think it seems like what you're doing is trying to capitalize on how these are getting easier and then, well, recognizing that you can do this sort of thing in 12 weeks versus having someone stop for two years and go out to a separate master's program.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1197.56
text: Definitely.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1198.12
text: And I think the other thing to point out, too, is, you know, with any candidate that comes in, whether they're coming in fresh out of university from another company or coming from our frontline, having come through one of these programs, there's always going to be some kind of skill gap, whether that is a analytic skill gap, whether that is a skill gap with not knowing or understanding the aviation industry.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1220.32
text: We just kind of have to decide what the right skill gap to take that risk on is and how we fill that gap.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1227.48
text: And so that's really what this is, is it's another way for us to kind of look and evaluate to fill that gap.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1232.92
text: I think the other thing, too, is within the Atlanta market, which is primarily the market we hire from, we have a lot of tech companies that have moved here.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1240.88
text: And so we're in a hyper competitive market within the analytics space.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1244.68
text: And so for us, it's how do we remain competitive and remain relevant?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1247.76
text: And so being a company that continues to invest in our employees and continues to give them those opportunities to learn and capitalize on different programs and some of the newest technologies that's out there is just another way to open that door.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1262.24
text: Michelle, we have a segment here where we ask our guests a series of rapid fire questions.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1267.0
text: Just say the first thing that comes to your mind.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1269.0800000000002
text: Sam, do you want to do it?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1271.48
text: What have you been proudest of regarding artificial intelligence?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1275.12
text: I think the biggest thing is being able to launch this program and be able to place 12 students in analytics roles.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1282.32
text: I thought you might say that because if I was looking at your story, that seems like the story that I would be pretty proud of there.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1288.1599999999999
text: We've heard a lot about bias and ethical issues regarding the use of data.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1293.52
text: Maybe beyond that, what else worries you about applying artificial intelligence?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1298.72
text: I definitely agree with you on the bias and ethical issues that exist.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1302.32
text: I think when we start to apply artificial intelligence, especially in the operations segment of the business, we a lot of times plan for what we consider a blue sky day.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1311.44
text: And we obviously calculate in what if a catastrophe happens or what if a gray sky day happens?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1319.68
text: But we don't plan for things like COVID-19.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1322.72
text: And we don't plan for things that are absolutely catastrophic that could completely disrupt that space.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1329.2
text: And so I think part of it is how do we find a happy medium and being able to rely on that data, but not necessarily take that all the way?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1339.04
text: What's your favorite activity that does not involve technology?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1342.4
text: Traveling, which is probably cheating because I work for an airline.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1345.84
text: Exactly.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1347.92
text: What was the first career you wanted?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1349.28
text: What did you want to be when you were a student?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1351.2
text: What career you wanted?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1352.24
text: What did you want to be when you grew up?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1354.4
text: HR analytics?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1356.48
text: I wanted to be an accountant because my dad was an accountant.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1360.32
text: And so I just knew I wanted to be in business.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1362.56
text: I was fascinated by business since I was a little kid.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1365.28
text: And I went to Michigan State University, went to my first accounting class, failed my first accounting class, and decided perhaps that was not the place for me.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1374.24
text: And found myself very quickly back into HR and haven't stopped since.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1379.76
text: Well, absolutely love the field and honestly love being in business.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1383.1200000000001
text: But I think for me, being able to blend the world of impacting people backed by data really is where my sweet spot is.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1391.52
text: That's great.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1392.24
text: We've had people want to be all kinds of different things, but accountant is definitely a first.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1397.92
text: Yeah, I wanted to be an accountant.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1399.1200000000001
text: I thought that was my dream job.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1401.6000000000001
text: Guess what?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1402.16
text: My accounting 101 professor did not think that was my dream job.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1407.0400000000002
text: What's your greatest wish for artificial intelligence in the future?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1409.92
text: What are you hoping we can gain from this?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1412.8000000000002
text: I will say I really hope that we are able to, as you mentioned before, one of the biggest concerns is bias.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1421.68
text: I want us to be able to find a way to work around that bias.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1424.5600000000002
text: And how can we use artificial intelligence to remove that bias?

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1428.72
text: Because whether it's data masking or whatever that may look like in order for us to get to that final answer, I think human nature, whether we can go through all the trainings, we can do everything we possibly want to ensure that there is no bias and ensure that we're doing everything the right way.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1446.16
text: But I think until we allow data to kind of back that for us, we're not going to be 100% there.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1453.1200000000001
text: Michelle, Shervin, I've really enjoyed talking with you today.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1455.44
text: I think there's a lot that other organizations can learn about your approaches to reskilling talent.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1462.0
text: And this may be a model program for lots of organizations.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1465.76
text: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about it and to share your experiences.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1469.76
text: Thank you for having me.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1470.56
text: Appreciate it.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1471.8400000000001
text: Thanks for joining us.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1472.88
text: To hear how another organization is learning to use AI, join us next time when we talk with Anders Butzpach-Christensen from the LEGO Group.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1485.44
text: Thank you for joining us.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1486.64
text: We're so grateful to you that the conversation about AI implementation doesn't start and stop with this podcast.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1492.16
text: That's why we've created a group on LinkedIn specifically for listeners like you.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1495.68
text: It's called AI for Leaders.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1497.44
text: And if you join us, you can chat with show creators and hosts, ask your own questions, share your insights, and gain access to valuable resources about AI implementation from MIT SMR and BCG.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1508.72
text: You can access it by visiting MITSMR.com forward slash AI for Leaders.

title: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin
id: A Third Path to Talent Development - Delta's Michelle McCrackin-t1515.04
text: And we hope to see you there.
